body.raw:
{
  "query": "Analyze the current state of the electric vehicle market in 2024 - key players, market size, growth trends, and future outlook",
  "userId": "{{user_id}}",
  "priority": "normal",
  "tags": ["electric-vehicles", "market-research", "2024", "automotive"],
  "framework": "langchain-multiagent",
  "options": {
    "searchDepth": "advanced",
    "maxResults": 15,
    "includeCharts": true,
    "reportFormat": "comprehensive",
    "includeDomains": ["reuters.com", "bloomberg.com", "marketresearch.com"],
    "excludeDomains": ["reddit.com", "quora.com"]
  }
}
